titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: PERSONS ELIGIBLE FOR NHS CONTINUING HEALTHCARE (REPORTING PERIOD END) - Description

div.p: PERSONS ELIGIBLE FOR NHS CONTINUING HEALTHCARE (REPORTING PERIOD END) is the number of PERSONS eligible for NHS Continuing Healthcare at the last day of the REPORTING PERIOD.

PERSONS ELIGIBLE FOR NHS CONTINUING HEALTHCARE (REPORTING PERIOD END) is derived from PERSONS ELIGIBLE FOR NHS CONTINUING HEALTHCARE (LAST DAY OF PREVIOUS REPORTING PERIOD), PERSONS NEWLY ELIGIBLE FOR NHS CONTINUING HEALTHCARE and PERSONS NO LONGER ELIGIBLE FOR NHS CONTINUING HEALTHCARE.
